title: UP5: Unbiased Foundation Model for Fairness-aware Recommendation. (arXiv:2305.12090v1 [cs.IR])
abstract: Recent advancements in foundation models such as large language models (LLM) have propelled them to the forefront of recommender systems (RS). Moreover, fairness in RS is critical since many users apply it for decision-making and demand fulfillment. However, at present, there is a lack of understanding regarding the level of fairness exhibited by recommendation foundation models and the appropriate methods for equitably treating different groups of users in foundation models. In this paper, we focus on user-side unfairness problem and show through a thorough examination that there is unfairness involved in LLMs that lead to unfair recommendation results. translated_title: UP5: 面向公平性推荐的无偏基础模型
translated_abstract: 基于大型语言模型（LLM）等基础模型的最新进展，已将它们推到了推荐系统（RS）的前沿。此外，RS中的公平性很关键，因为许多用户将其用于决策和需求履行。然而，目前尚缺乏对推荐基础模型展示公平性水平和公平处理不同用户群组的适当方法的理解。本文侧重于用户方面的不公平问题，并通过彻底检查表明，LLMs中存在不公平性，导致不公平的推荐结果。为了消除LLM中的偏差以实现面向公平性的推荐，我们引入了一种基于反事实公平促进技术的新型无偏P5（UP5）基础模型。CFP包括两个子模块：个性化前缀提示和Prompt混合，从而增强了个体敏感属性的公平性。
tldr: 本研究提出了一种新颖的基础模型UP5，它采用反事实公平促进技术来消除大型语言模型中的偏见，从而实现面向公平性的推荐。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a novel UP5 foundation model that uses Counterfactually-Fair-Prompting techniques to eliminate bias from large language models for fairness-aware recommendation.
